content:
def pan_up(event: KeyEvent):
        y_limits = plotter.get_y_limits()
        shift = y_limits.height * 0.1
        plotter.set_y_limits(y_limits.bottom + shift, y_limits.top + shift)

    def pan_down(event: KeyEvent):
        y_limits = plotter.get_y_limits()
        shift = y_limits.height * 0.1
        plotter.set_y_limits(y_limits.bottom - shift, y_limits.top - shift)
